allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add semantic internal links across all pages for SEO

- Homepage: Link proof cards to case studies, hero meta to work/case studies
- About: Link work mentions, $30M ARR to case study, speaking engagements
- Work: Link metrics to case studies, add SEO governance case study link
- Speaking: Link topics to relevant case studies
- Contact: Add links to work history and case studies
- Case Studies: Add CTA section with links to about/speaking/contact

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing external links on About page and update Jeff''s title on homepage

- Link Search Results Media, Bluehost, HostGator, Yoast in career timeline
- Link Government of Gujarat and GLS Leaf in Squid Sense entry and story
- Link Ahmedabad, India to Wikipedia in story section
- Update Jeff McMahon''s title to Director, Digital Performance on homepage

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add structured data schemas across all pages for SEO and AEO

Homepage:
- Enhanced Person schema with @id, address, expanded knowsAbout
- Added VideoObject schema for 4 YouTube speaking videos
- Added Recommendation schema for both testimonials

Case Studies:
- Added Article schema with datePublished, author, keywords, OG article type
- Added BreadcrumbList schema for site hierarchy

Speaking:
- Added Event schema for all 4 webinars/talks
- Added EducationEvent schema for BrainStation and IAB Canada
- Added BreadcrumbList schema

Contact:
- Added ContactPoint schema for LinkedIn and email
- Added BreadcrumbList schema

About:
- Set OG type to profile with first/last name
- Added BreadcrumbList schema

Layout:
- Added WebSite schema \(global\)
- Enhanced robots meta with maxSnippet, maxImagePreview, maxVideoPreview
- Added canonical URL
- Added dns-prefetch for YouTube thumbnails

All pages:
- Added canonical URLs via alternates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add remaining structured data schemas and update sitemap

Work page:
- Added OrganizationRole schema for career history with Organization entities
- Added BreadcrumbList schema
- Added canonical URL

Case Studies index:
- Added CollectionPage + ItemList schema listing all case studies
- Added BreadcrumbList schema
- Added canonical URL

Homepage:
- Added affiliation/alumniOf Organization schemas for key brands

Speaking:
- Added VideoObject schema for 3 YouTube talk recordings

About:
- Added FAQPage schema for growth philosophy Q&A \(3 questions\)

Sitemap:
- Updated lastmod dates to reflect today''s changes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
